meanings.definition: A detailed analysis or assessment of something.
meanings.sent1: Her critique of the book highlighted its strengths and weaknesses.
meanings.sent2: The professor provided a critique of the student's research paper.
meanings.sent3: The critique of the movie was so thorough, it felt like a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: His critique of the new policy was like shining a spotlight on its flaws.
meanings.sent5: The detailed critique of the painting made it easier to understand the artist's intentions.

meanings.definition: A critical review or evaluation of a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The art critic's critique of the exhibition was insightful.
meanings.sent2: She received a harsh critique from the literary magazine.
meanings.sent3: The critique of the play was so exaggerated, it sounded like a comedy routine.
meanings.sent4: His critique of the poem was like dissecting each word under a microscope.
meanings.sent5: The passionate critique of the sculpture left a lasting impression on the audience.
